name: ibm-security-guardium-insights
label: IBM Security Guardium Insights
description: IBM Security Guardium Insights is a modern data security solution built to adapt to changing environments, connect to critical IT and security tools, streamline compliance and audit processes, and intelligently respond to data threats.

fields.title: Server URL
fields.name: server_url
fields.description: URL of the IBM Security Guardium Insights server to which you will connect and perform automated operations.

fields.title: Encoded Token
fields.name: encoded_token
fields.description: Encoded Token which you get when you craete a new API Key in IBM Security Guardium Insights. For details: https://www.ibm.com/docs/en/guardium-insights/3.0.x?topic=administering-api-keys#settings_api

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.name: verify_ssl
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not. By default, this option is set as True.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of all the available report categories from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the input parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Report Categories List

parameters.title: Report ID
parameters.name: report_id
parameters.description: Specify the ID of report to retrieve its report category from the IBM Security Guardium Insights. You can get report ID from 'Get Reports List' action.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the ID of report to retrieve its report category from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of all the reports from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the input parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Reports List

parameters.title: Category ID
parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description: Specify the category ID of report to retrieve from the IBM Security Guardium Insights. You can get category ID from 'Get Report Categories List' action.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the category ID of report to retrieve from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of all the policies from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
operations.title: Get Policies List

operations.description: Retrieves the details of the policy from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the policy ID specified.
operations.title: Get Policy Details

parameters.title: Policy ID
parameters.name: policy_id
parameters.description: Specify the policy ID to retrieve details of policy from the IBM Security Guardium Insights. You can get policy ID from 'Get Policies List' action.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the policy to retrieve details of policy from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of all the cases from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the input parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Cases List

parameters.title: Case ID
parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: Specify the case ID to retrieve from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the case ID to retrieve from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of cases that this operation should return.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of cases that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: To skip the first n element based upon the value you specify in there
parameters.description: Specify the count of the first few records to skip while retrieving response.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of all the tasks from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the input parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Tasks List

parameters.title: Case ID
parameters.name: case_id
parameters.description: Specify the case ID to retrieve from the IBM Security Guardium Insights. You can get Case ID from 'Get Cases List' action
parameters.tooltip: Specify the case ID to retrieve from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: Task ID
parameters.name: task_id
parameters.description: Specify the task ID to retrieve from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the task ID to retrieve from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of all the groups from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
operations.title: Get Groups List

operations.description: Retrieves the list of all the members of the group from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the group ID specified.
operations.title: Get Group Members List

parameters.title: Group ID
parameters.name: group_id
parameters.description: Specify the group ID or comma-separated group IDs to retrieve group members from the IBM Security Guardium Insights. You can get group ID from 'Get groups List' action.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the group ID or comma-separated group IDs to retrieve group members from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

operations.description: Retrieves the compliance data from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
operations.title: Get Compliance Data

operations.description: Retrieves the list of all the connections accounts from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the input parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Connections List

parameters.title: Account ID
parameters.name: account_id
parameters.description: Specify the account ID to retrieve connection account from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the account ID to retrieve connection account from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: Account Access Key
parameters.name: access_key
parameters.description: Specify the account access key to retrieve connection account from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the account access key to retrieve connection account from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of all the datasets from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the input parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Datasets List

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: filter.start_time
parameters.description: Specify the datetime to retrieve datasets created at this time or later from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the datetime to retrieve datasets created at this time or later from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: filter.end_time
parameters.description: Specify the datetime to retrieve datasets created before this time from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the datetime to retrieve datasets created before this time from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of datasets that this operation should return.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of datasets that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: To skip the first n element based upon the value you specify in there
parameters.description: Specify the count of the first few records to skip while retrieving response.

operations.description: Retrieves the data report of specified dataset from IBM Security Guardium Insights.
operations.title: Get Dataset Data

parameters.title: Dataset Name
parameters.name: dataset_name
parameters.description: Specify the name of the dataset to retrieve its data report from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the name of the dataset to retrieve its data report from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of records that this operation should return.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of records that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: To skip the first n element based upon the value you specify in there
parameters.description: Specify the count of the first few records to skip while retrieving response.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of all the notifications from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the input parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Notifications List

parameters.title: Start Time
parameters.name: filter.start_time
parameters.description: Specify the datetime to retrieve notifications created at this time or later from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the datetime to retrieve notifications created at this time or later from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: End Time
parameters.name: filter.end_time
parameters.description: Specify the datetime to retrieve notifications created before this time from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the datetime to retrieve notifications created before this time from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: State
parameters.name: filter.state
parameters.tooltip: Specify the state of notifications to retrieve from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.
parameters.description: Specify the state of notifications to retrieve from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of notifications that this operation should return.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of notifications that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: To skip the first n element based upon the value you specify in there
parameters.description: Specify the count of the first few records to skip while retrieving response.

operations.description: Retrieves the list of all the scheduled jobs and the linked tasks from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the input parameters specified.
operations.title: Get Schedules List

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.name: limit
parameters.tooltip: Specify the maximum number of records that this operation should return.
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of records that this operation should return.

parameters.title: Offset
parameters.name: offset
parameters.tooltip: To skip the first n element based upon the value you specify in there
parameters.description: Specify the count of the first few records to skip while retrieving response.

operations.description: Retrieves the details of the scheduled job from IBM Security Guardium Insights based on the schedule ID specified.
operations.title: Get Scheduled Job Details

parameters.title: Schedule ID
parameters.name: schedule_id
parameters.description: Specify the schedule ID to retrieve details of scheduled job from the IBM Security Guardium Insights. You can get schedule ID from 'Get Schedules List' action.
parameters.tooltip: Specify the schedule ID to retrieve details of scheduled job from the IBM Security Guardium Insights.
